AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Bruni: destination of travel, located at the southern terminus of FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: farm-to-market road taken by defendants to avoid checkpoints, intersects with U.S. 59 and has an indirect route to Bruni
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville: location with a checkpoint on U.S. 359 that defendants attempted to avoid
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: origin of journey for defendants RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 359: alternative route that travels in an easterly direction and has a checkpoint in Hebbronville
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: route taken by defendants before turning onto FM 2050, intersects with Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ranchitos Las Lomas: possible origin of journey for defendants if U.S. 359 was not immediately accessible
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2895: alternative farm-to-market road that would be a more direct route to Bruni
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville checkpoint: checkpoint on U.S. 359 that defendants attempted to avoid by taking the indirect route of U.S. 59 to FM 2050
